channel.title: HELP with 525 server and client
channel.description:
need help with setting up completely new to 525 servers and have no idea how to get it going >.<
-when i try to compile the source i get "the system cannot find the path specified" iv edited the compiler to my jdk but im still getting this ^ come up when i try to compile
-when i try to log in through my client i get "no response from server, please try a different world iv changed the clients ip to my ip and am still getting this
im sure there are other errors and things iv missed out but it would be great if someone could quickly go through with me and help set me up.
any help or advice would be great, thankyou

item.title: HELP with 525 server and client

item.description:
@pure2ownage wrote:

wtf do you mean u still cant edit it.
check your registry settings; maybe its blocked from there.

item.title: HELP with 525 server and client
item.dc:creator: @pure2ownage Pure_
item.description:
@pure2ownage wrote:

@echo off if exist "%programfiles%\Java" (call :compile "%programfiles%\Java\") else (goto error) :compile for /D %%x in ("%~1jdk*") do (set p="%%~x\bin\javac.exe") if defined p (%p% -cp . *.java) if defined p (goto end) :error echo You do not have Java installed. Please download it at the site that is about to load. "%programfiles%\Internet Explorer\iexplore.exe" http://java.sun.com/javase/downloads/index.jsp :end echo Finished! pause exit

Read full topic

item.title: HELP with 525 server and client
item.dc:creator: @beennn beennn
item.description:
@beennn wrote:

sorry for not updating, iv managed to connect to the server now and fixed all the above but i now have some new probs >.<

when i try to edit the bat files to my jdk version i get “filename, directory name, or volume label syntax is incorrect” so i cant compile the server

do you know if theres anyway to fix this?

im using - jdk1.6.0_20

Read full topic
